text: Hum ney bait-ullah ko logon kay liye sawab aur aman-o-aman ki jagah banaee tum muqam-e-ibrahim ko jaye namaz muqarrar ker lo hum ney ibrahim (alh-e-salam) aur ismail (alh-e-salam) say wada liya kay tum meray ghar ko tawaf kerney walon aur aeytikaaf kerney walon aur rukoo sajda kerney walon kay pak saaf rakho
